Body:
"""Test user policy endpoints."""
self.client.create_user(UserName=self.user)
self.client.create_policy(PolicyName='Admins', PolicyDocument=POLICY_DOC)
self.client.attach_user_policy(UserName=self.user, PolicyArn=self.policy)
response = self.client.list_attached_user_policies(UserName=self.user)
assert 'Admins' == response['AttachedPolicies'][0]['PolicyName']
assert 1 == len(response['AttachedPolicies'])
self.client.detach_user_policy(UserName=self.user, PolicyArn=self.policy)
response = self.client.list_attached_user_policies(UserName=self.user)
assert 0 == len(response['AttachedPolicies'])
mock_iam
